pr_title: Replace InjectedUser with User during serialization

timeline.message: Replace InjectedUser with User during serialization

timeline.bodyText: What is this function used for ?
timeline.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: It is used by Java serializer to substitute object for a different object. See Serializable.
replies.author: vrozov

timeline.bodyText: @vrozov I understand this change has been merged. But out of curiosity, why was this class defined as a public? You removed "public" because it doesn't need to be public or being public could cause any side effect?
timeline.author: cliu123
